twitch_info.title: [CL/ES/EN] Some Battle City Speedrun attempts since IDK what to play

message.body: uvq3tsa is now live! Streaming Battle City: [CL/ES/EN] Some Battle City Speedrun attempts since IDK what to play
shauinLURK going for some Tanks today?
Alright SeriousSloth
Hey welcome back shauinHi
It is always diff right?
Witzig download and upload for streams
For*
German Tastatur again LUL
Witzig = funny
Hmm yeah, I can check mine
90mbit download and 50mbit upload for me here
It is well then enough for streams but the connection still can get lost anyways SUBtember
GL shauinGL
Yeah, I didn't play anything on PC for 3months now
But more on consoles again Ps1, Wii or Switch
What did you say again? Couldn't hear it xd
Yeah yeah
No emulation real games and console
I am catching up on some games of my brothers childhood
My favourite console still will be the snes from my childhood
I got a lot here SeriousSloth
Showed you a picture of my snes actually long ago haha
From Gameboy to Snes and Nes to Ps1 and Wii
Ahh nice
PS3 is sad that only some of them can play Ps2 games, but ps1 no problemo
Since they removed that SeriousSloth
I like to experience games first time with the real console
But it comes at a cost xd
So I played Prince of Persia first time on the snes, a reason why I liked it that much in a young age.
Without knowing the other versions at all for a long time
I hated lion King for the snes and still played it LUL
Prince of Persia was actually difficult for me, but I endured the pain and made it to the end.
Only seeing a sleepy princess cause I took 4 hours to reach the end first time merkur7Stress
Yeah
Until you reach Lv20
But some events are not happening
Since you ran out of time
The game goes on but it shows you the 0min
Regardless there is a sad ending and a good ending
Which is pretty cool in perspective
Princess dies in 2hours when she refuses to marry jaffar
Since you got no more time the spell does its thing and you see the result after reaching the last floor
No Jaffar fight, he went somewhere else already
Doesn't DOS have a bad ending as well?
With no more time
Yeah lv13
Really? uvq3tsMonkas
The timer only freezes when Jaffar dies right?
Since in snes it freezes at lv20 permanently
It is interesting how they changed simple things and it has so much different impact on the versions xd
Really? Didn't know uvq3tsThinking
Snes has the most scenes overall since the length

Lv.5 mirror split into shadow - Lv.6 new Boss Amazon Lv.9 Big Boss and downfall into the lava levels Lv.12 golden Skeleton as a gate keeper - Lv.13 Jaffar closes you between gates and mouse rescue -Lv.15 reunion with your Shadow and Jaffar again - Lv.16, 18 Red Blue Gate Guard L. 17 Ashura and Lv.19Buss Rush with Jaffar in the Background - on Top Lv.20 you fight him in his own Arena
Compared to the other versions they match with a lot merkur7Love
For the whole scenes in the snes
Pop version
You don't have to read the list LUL just wanted to write them down
The list stands for all scenes, when the game freezes you initially or keeps you waiting at some points.
Also represents how bosses get inrmtroduced with special music
If I do something else beside that?
@uvq3tsa -> Current Stream Game: Battle City
!game
!title
@uvq3tsa -> Current Stream Title: [CL/ES/EN] Some Battle City Speedrun attempts since IDK what to play
I did stop for some days caus eof the headache and illness, but I want to do some more. Only played some games and stayed warm - doing some homework and watching YouTube videos haha SeriousSloth
Nothing really special, but I would like to go more out often and start streaming again ' but I got a fear to overcome.
I stopped using my PC out of fear * not cause I can't
Not with streams rather stress
It isn't as bad as it may sounds, but I don't like how the whole AI stuff goes on and PC security
I mean it is good we advance, but not at the cost of others peoples worl you know
cost*
Writing on a phone isn't easy as well LUL
I think it is connected with the fear of losing all on the PC. It is bizarre, but small stuff can get big in your head once you care to much.
We don't need cheap viewers, we want the expensive ones! SeriousSloth
Expensive ones are the most valuable xd not in cost but in connection
I mean losing isn't as bad as it sounds you yourself decide the value
and always can restore the stuff. It takes time and patience
I think I did value the PC way to much and the result is I can't use it properly without thinking destroying it while using it xd
It is stupid thinking in the end, but a fear is a fear in the end you have to face to overcome it.
Like some don't like spiders, I came to the same fear. More Rational - nothing bad happened - I got hacked once, but could restore all stuff in minutes gladly.
I guess since that I play more on my consoles, which I didn't use that often so it isn't all bad news.
I was stupid enough to click on a spam link from a friend
It is brutal, but they only looked for valuable accounts anyway and I don't have anything on the PC LUL
That one time was a life lesson not gona lie
Don't trust anyone with a link
And don't share anything even when asked, since most professional sites don't
The scam is about getting bot viewers for money
Simple and annoying
While bots flood comments everywhere
So far with our safety anyways LUL
Discord Bot dilemma yeah remember
Don't accept friends request until you are sure they are fine
It is really scary kids could get trapped by stuff like that shauinANGRY
There is literally no safety
Yeah age gap 13 - 16
Still very young
I got lucky that I didn't fall for scams
Ok SeriousSloth will wait till ya back xd
Glad you guys didn't scam me hahaha
But you have to be careful nowadays even more than before
Even advertisements on Twitch can be scams with money
Like investments or gambling
Classic Add block LUL
Most annoying thing are scam emails man
Oh shauinOOH
It isn't Netflix what a trap...
It is just diabolical what they trap you in so you believe its legit
For your money...
Hahaha LUL
FREE LUL
Nothing is free it's n illusion
Free was the time when you bought something and own it
Today's free is a subscription and you own nothing in the end
Like Nintendo tries to sell empty cards to you and have to downland the game on the console, bro just put the game into the card... it safes so much space and doesn't need Internet SeriousSloth
Wenas mi rey saludos, como lo trata la vida? martin645Bless
Hola @mar_tintin merkur7Love
@merkur_dx martin645Amor
80€ for one game is a joke LUL
Everything good papu, how are the runs going?
At least we have good stuff to talk about shauinOOH

martin645ElmaDecepcionada
@mar_tintin Vi que tocaste Hollow Knight Silk Song hace unos días. ¿Te gustó? Hablo un poco español SeriousSloth
A true yeah
@merkur_dx si señor, estuve jugando silksong. Lo odio tanto como hollow knight 1 LUL
Haha I mean it is head yeah
Also i was (until today) replaying HK until the Grimm dlc
Silk Song is very hard later on
Hollow Knight I did finish all stuff, but had issues at the Grimm Troop PopNemo PopNemo
I just hate rooms that lock you with enemies or pay to use the saves or maps. Silksong cracks that concept to 11
I think for the money it is way better than triple A games in comparison, no details
@mar_tintin Double Dmg is also annoying on big normal enemies yes - flying ones are so painful to fight with their Double hits LUL
I mean they could make it less stressful, I died often as well in those enemy spawns
You should try it Estebanm you only lose your mind trying to beat it SeriousSloth
Good to hear about it martin645Bless
I started with 2 friends in a room and oh boi, did we have fun LUL
I mean its ok to like the game, but i just dont enjoy that type of misery on my life
I mean it was fun for our neighbours since we yelled a lot SeriousSloth
The people in general enjoy both hk and silksong, so more power to them
@merkur_dx FamilyMan
I like Dark Souls, can't be good for me right? SeriousSloth
Yeah yeah i remember
@merkur_dx i like dark souls too, but hk aint it for me martin645Sad
Really? Nice :)
Nice martin645Perfect
Dark Souls 1 is my favorite by far merkur7Cute
Followed by 3 and then 2 LUL
Elden Ring was painful to navigate really
Praise the Sun all I say xd
Do you hate lots of people?
I mean that is an argument for you
People mess around all the time or are annoying
Yeah, understand
To my reality most of my old friends didn't wanted to interact with each other until I did something but I don't take the work on me anymore
Like it is your job to fare for your friends not mine right SeriousSloth
care*
Example*<
But some made it my business
Or ppl that talk behind you are the worst
Group project: you do all the work and we get all a good grade nice.
Till today I hate group tasks cause most of the work gets to the guy who leads the stuff cause nothing happens otherwise.
It is also very sad that my friends from class had to be really mean, it was common to be mean in the group.
Otherwise you are the victim
Once I had to write an exam but my pants was wet cause they had thrown me into the wet snow, as a lecture not to be special
Such stuff really gets to you as a kid
Teachers didn't care at all LUL they are NPCs all the time
Kappa
On my school* ahem
Cause there are good teachers that care
Teachers dont give two fucks about anything, the good ones are hard to find
Well said
My teacher yelled at me for being bad math
Maybe he didn't understand how to teach
Slowly getting there
Hard to do with bad salary and kids exposed to phones day 1 after being born
Phone problem is really annoying
And also that there is no respect towards anyone anymore
Being a teacher is like being a mafia boss who has to teach his crooks how to open a bag and insert money
Only that they don't listen and use their phones
And still fail LUL with AI
Yup yup, weird time of the human race with the pocket bricks
We got a new system where they have to put their phones into a box for the whole day
And believe me, it helps!
@uvq3tsa -> The stream game has been updated to: I Wanna Be the Guy
We should be aiming at somethimg like that, wonder when will it happen
!game I wanna be the guy
Getting more concentration and less distraction. They don't use AI and instead their brain...
Like commonwealth did it so they can! Without a device - read books etc. it isn't that hard
But starting this process isn't easy.
Music, kinder, school and high school
All is infected with phones
Worst is the school still LUL
Everything depends of the group, but on default high school is really hard around here
The problem for Germany is also the language barrier, since a lot of kids can't read or speak any German - so the numbers go down every year here.
Phones push this even more further, since they don't learn basics at all, only to trust some sort of robot with the answers.
Music theory is part of my program alongside many other subjects
Music is important merkur7Love
I played in the school opening once
